Acrylic on canvas, 16 x 84 x 1 3/4 inches

Handwritten on the lower right of the painting is the artist's signature and handwritten on the top stretcher on the back of the painting is the title and signature and copyright on the back of the canvas. 
 
Recto signature Lower right 
Verso top stretcher AC 538 Hopi Montage # 11 
canvas signed © Namingha

Painting, Acrylic on canvas. Using a horizontal format segmented in three parts depicting on the left a Kachina against a neutral background of biege complemented by a stand of delineated cactus-like forms. At the center, irregular and geometric cultural symbols are set against a mottled background in pink, dissolving at the left into transparent bands of light green and pink against a beige background and held visually in place by a gray-black horizontal band. The center is partitioned from both sides of he composition with a vertical band in light blue on the left and a black and white band on the right. The right portion of the composition depicts a Kachina, similar in size and posture to the figure on the left side. but now in grays and black against a vivid mottled background of red, orange and salmon colors with circular symbols at each side.
